devour.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to eat something quickly because you are very hungry
devour.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to read something quickly and eagerly, or watch something with great interest
devour.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: Her body had been almost entirely devoured by the disease.
devour.translation[0].definitions[3].def: to use up all of something
devour.translation[0].definitions[3].exa: a job that devours all my energy
